rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains a factual description of action.
No moderate verbs paired with significant scale or impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports factual information about how money will be used.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes how funds will be used ('will use the money to partner') without active reassurance.
